'''Golden Apple Pastry''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Golden Apple Pastry is available from the [[Genshin Impact x McDonald's]] Event.

Depending on the quality, Golden Apple Pastry increases the party's attack by '''224'''/'''272'''/'''320''' and critical rate by '''6'''/'''8'''/'''10'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
